entries.meaning: Maintenance; the act or effort of keeping something in good and working condition.
examples: I would enjoy having a swimming pool, but I don't want to deal with the upkeep.

verbs.description: upkeep (third-person singular simple present upkeeps, present participle upkeeping, simple past and past participle upkept)

entries.meaning: (transitive, Britain) To maintain (something) or keep it in good repair.
examples: Do you know how to upkeep a boat?
